<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
         xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>

    <groupId>com.dream.codec</groupId>
    <artifactId>tlv-parent</artifactId>
    <version>2.0.0</version>
    <packaging>pom</packaging>

    <url>https://github.com/DreamJM/TLVCodec</url>

    <properties>
        <project.build.sourceEncoding>UTF-8</project.build.sourceEncoding>
        <project.reporting.outputEncoding>UTF-8</project.reporting.outputEncoding>
        <maven.compiler.source>1.8</maven.compiler.source>
        <maven.compiler.target>1.8</maven.compiler.target>
        <maven.compiler.compilerVersion>1.8</maven.compiler.compilerVersion>
        <spring.boot.version>2.2.4.RELEASE</spring.boot.version>
        <guava.version>29.0-jre</guava.version>
        <junit5.version>5.6.0</junit5.version>
    </properties>

    <distributionManagement>
        <site>
            <id>${project.artifactId}-site</id>
            <url>file://./</url>
        </site>
    </distributionManagement>

    <modules>
        <module>tlv</module>
        <module>tlv-spring-boot-starter</module>
        <module>tlv-spring</module>
    </modules>

    <dependencyManagement>
        <dependencies>
            <dependency>
                <groupId>com.google.guava</groupId>
                <artifactId>guava</artifactId>
                <version>${guava.version}</version>
            </dependency>
            <dependency>
                <groupId>org.junit.jupiter</groupId>
                <artifactId>junit-jupiter-api</artifactId>
                <version>${junit5.version}</version>
            </dependency>
            <dependency>
                <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
                <artifactId>spring-boot-dependencies</artifactId>
                <version>${spring.boot.version}</version>
                <type>pom</type>
                <scope>import</scope>
            </dependency>
        </dependencies>
    </dependencyManagement>

    <build>
        <plugins>
            <plugin>
                <artifactId>maven-javadoc-plugin</artifactId>
            </plugin>
            <plugin>
                <artifactId>maven-source-plugin</artifactId>
            </plugin>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>com.github.spotbugs</groupId>
                <artifactId>spotbugs-maven-plugin</artifactId>
            </plugin>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.jacoco</groupId>
                <artifactId>jacoco-maven-plugin</artifactId>
            </plugin>
        </plugins>
        <pluginManagement>
            <plugins>
                <plugin>
                    <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                    <artifactId>maven-surefire-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>3.0.0-M4</version>
                    <dependencies>
                        <dependency>
                            <groupId>org.junit.jupiter</groupId>
                            <artifactId>junit-jupiter-engine</artifactId>
                            <version>5.6.0</version>
                        </dependency>
                    </dependencies>
                </plugin>
                <plugin>
                    <artifactId>maven-javadoc-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>3.1.1</version>
                    <configuration>
                        <encoding>UTF-8</encoding>
                        <charset>UTF-8</charset>
                        <docencoding>UTF-8</docencoding>
                    </configuration>
                    <executions>
                        <execution>
                            <id>attach-javadocs</id>
                            <goals>
                                <goal>jar</goal>
                            </goals>
                        </execution>
                    </executions>
                </plugin>
                <plugin>
                    <artifactId>maven-source-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>3.2.1</version>
                    <executions>
                        <execution>
                            <id>attach-sources</id>
                            <goals>
                                <goal>jar</goal>
                            </goals>
                        </execution>
                    </executions>
                </plugin>
                <!-- spotbugs plugin: 1. mvn spotbugs:spotbugs to generate report 2. mvn spotbugs:gui to show results -->
                <plugin>
                    <groupId>com.github.spotbugs</groupId>
                    <artifactId>spotbugs-maven-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>3.1.12.2</version>
                    <dependencies>
                        <dependency>
                            <groupId>com.github.spotbugs</groupId>
                            <artifactId>spotbugs</artifactId>
                            <version>4.0.0-RC3</version>
                        </dependency>
                    </dependencies>
                    <configuration>
                        <outputEncoding>UTF-8</outputEncoding>
                        <sourceEncoding>UTF-8</sourceEncoding>
                        <xmlOutput>true</xmlOutput>
                        <omitVisitors>FindReturnRef</omitVisitors>
                        <plugins>
                            <plugin>
                                <groupId>com.h3xstream.findsecbugs</groupId>
                                <artifactId>findsecbugs-plugin</artifactId>
                                <version>1.10.1</version>
                            </plugin>
                            <plugin>
                                <groupId>com.mebigfatguy.fb-contrib</groupId>
                                <artifactId>fb-contrib</artifactId>
                                <version>7.4.3.sb</version>
                            </plugin>
                        </plugins>
                    </configuration>
                </plugin>
                <plugin>
                    <groupId>org.jacoco</groupId>
                    <artifactId>jacoco-maven-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>0.8.5</version>
                    <executions>
                        <execution>
                            <id>jacoco-prepare</id>
                            <goals>
                                <goal>prepare-agent</goal>
                            </goals>
                        </execution>
                        <execution>
                            <id>jacoco-report</id>
                            <phase>test</phase>
                            <goals>
                                <goal>report</goal>
                            </goals>
                        </execution>
                    </executions>
                </plugin>
                <plugin>
                    <artifactId>maven-project-info-reports-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>3.0.0</version>
                </plugin>
                <plugin>
                    <artifactId>maven-site-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>3.8.2</version>
                    <executions>
                        <execution>
                            <id>site-stage</id>
                            <phase>site</phase>
                            <goals>
                                <goal>stage</goal>
                            </goals>
                        </execution>
                    </executions>
                </plugin>
            </plugins>
        </pluginManagement>
    </build>

    <reporting>
        <plugins>
            <plugin>
                <artifactId>maven-javadoc-plugin</artifactId>
            </plugin>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>com.github.spotbugs</groupId>
                <artifactId>spotbugs-maven-plugin</artifactId>
            </plugin>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.jacoco</groupId>
                <artifactId>jacoco-maven-plugin</artifactId>
                <reportSets>
                    <reportSet>
                        <reports>
                            <report>report</report>
                        </reports>
                    </reportSet>
                </reportSets>
            </plugin>
        </plugins>
    </reporting>
</project>

# Java 17 Migration Summary for TLVCodec

## Overview
Successfully migrated the TLVCodec project from Java 8 to Java 17.

## Changes Made

### 1. Parent POM (pom.xml)

#### Java Version Update
- Updated `maven.compiler.source` from `1.8` to `17`
- Updated `maven.compiler.target` from `1.8` to `17`
- Updated `maven.compiler.compilerVersion` from `1.8` to `17`

#### Dependency Version Updates
- **Spring Boot**: `2.2.4.RELEASE` → `3.3.4`
- **Guava**: `29.0-jre` → `33.0.0-jre`
- **JUnit 5**: `5.6.0` → `5.11.0`

#### Maven Plugin Version Updates
- **maven-surefire-plugin**: `3.0.0-M4` → `3.2.5`
  - Removed explicit junit-jupiter-engine dependency (now auto-detected)
- **maven-javadoc-plugin**: `3.1.1` → `3.6.3`
  - Added `<source>17</source>` configuration
- **maven-source-plugin**: `3.2.1` → `3.3.0`
- **spotbugs-maven-plugin**: `3.1.12.2` → `4.8.3.1`
  - spotbugs core: `4.0.0-RC3` → `4.8.3`
  - findsecbugs-plugin: `1.10.1` → `1.13.0`
  - fb-contrib: `7.4.3.sb` → `7.6.4`
- **jacoco-maven-plugin**: `0.8.5` → `0.8.11`
- **maven-project-info-reports-plugin**: `3.0.0` → `3.5.0`
- **maven-site-plugin**: `3.8.2` → `3.12.1`

### 2. Module POM Files

#### tlv/pom.xml
- Changed JUnit dependency from `junit-jupiter-api` to `junit-jupiter` (aggregator artifact)
- This includes junit-jupiter-api, junit-jupiter-params, and junit-jupiter-engine

### 3. Spring Boot 3.x Migration

#### tlv-spring-boot-starter
- **DreamTLVAutoConfiguration.java**: Updated `@Configuration` to `@Configuration(proxyBeanMethods = false)` for Spring Boot 3.x best practices
- **Spring Boot AutoConfiguration**: Created new `META-INF/spring/org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.AutoConfiguration.imports` file
  - This replaces the deprecated `META-INF/spring.factories` approach in Spring Boot 3.x
  - Added: `com.dream.codec.tlv.DreamTLVAutoConfiguration`
- Kept the old `spring.factories` file for backward compatibility

### 4. Code Changes

#### ContentDecoder.java
Fixed deprecated wrapper class constructors (removed for Java 9+):
- `new Byte(value)` → `Byte.valueOf(value)`
- `new Short(value)` → `Short.valueOf(value)`
- `new Integer(value)` → `Integer.valueOf(value)`
- `new Long(value)` → `Long.valueOf(value)`

### 5. Build Verification

All builds and tests pass successfully:
```
[INFO] Tests run: 1, Failures: 0, Errors: 0, Skipped: 0
[INFO] BUILD SUCCESS
```

## Modules Successfully Migrated

1. **tlv-parent** - Parent POM with shared configuration
2. **tlv** - Core TLV codec library
3. **tlv-spring-boot-starter** - Spring Boot autoconfiguration
4. **tlv-spring** - Spring Framework integration

## Java 17 Features Available

The codebase is now ready to use Java 17 features:
- Sealed classes
- Pattern matching for switch
- Records
- Text blocks
- var keyword enhancements
- New APIs in java.util, java.time, etc.

## Notes

1. **Spring Boot 3.x**: Requires Java 17 as minimum version
2. **No javax to jakarta migration needed**: The code doesn't use any Java EE APIs that need migration
3. **Guava**: Updated to version 33.0.0-jre which fully supports Java 17
4. **Backward Compatibility**: Spring Boot 3.x is a major version upgrade and may have breaking changes for consumers of this library

## Testing

- All unit tests pass with Java 17
- Maven build completes successfully with `mvn clean verify`
- Code compiles with Java 17 target without errors
